channel.title: CVE Feed for notepad-plus-plus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for notepad-plus-plus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-40166|2023-08-25T20:20:20.390Z -- notepad-plus-plus -- notepad-plus-plus
item.description: Notepad++ is a free and open-source source code editor. Versions 8.5.6 and prior are vulnerable to heap buffer read overflow in `FileManager::detectLanguageFromTextBegining `. The exploitability of this issue is not clear. Potentially, it may be used to leak internal memory allocation information. As of time of publication, no known patches are available in existing versions of Notepad++.

item.title: CVE-2023-40164|2023-08-25T20:17:49.890Z -- notepad-plus-plus -- notepad-plus-plus
item.description: Notepad++ is a free and open-source source code editor. Versions 8.5.6 and prior are vulnerable to global buffer read overflow in `nsCodingStateMachine::NextStater`. The exploitability of this issue is not clear. Potentially, it may be used to leak internal memory allocation information. As of time of publication, no known patches are available in existing versions of Notepad++.

item.title: CVE-2023-40036|2023-08-25T20:18:01.997Z -- notepad-plus-plus -- notepad-plus-plus
item.description: Notepad++ is a free and open-source source code editor. Versions 8.5.6 and prior are vulnerable to global buffer read overflow in `CharDistributionAnalysis::HandleOneChar`. The exploitability of this issue is not clear. Potentially, it may be used to leak internal memory allocation information. As of time of publication, no known patches are available in existing versions of Notepad++.

item.title: CVE-2023-40031|2023-08-25T20:18:23.949Z -- notepad-plus-plus -- notepad-plus-plus
item.description: Notepad++ is a free and open-source source code editor. Versions 8.5.6 and prior are vulnerable to heap buffer write overflow in `Utf8_16_Read::convert`. This issue may lead to arbitrary code execution. As of time of publication, no known patches are available in existing versions of Notepad++.
